description:
With these skins you'll be king of the hill . . . and the flats. Designed for professional skiers, avid skimo racers and anyone who prizes efficiency. The blend of 70% mohair and 30% nylon glides wonderfully and grips with tenacity.

  • Made of mohair with a plush surface for smooth glide and nylon for added durability
  • Waterproof membrane plus waterproof treatment keeps skins as dry as possible, as long as possible
  • Clicklock tip loops fit a wide variety of ski tips
  • Adjustable tail-strap connector offers 11cm of adjustment
  • Skin-trimming tool makes the trimming process easy and successful on the first try
  • Skin bag included
name: Pomoca Climb Pro S-Glide R2C 120mm CF Skins V2
